description.value:
(Requires attunement - Can only be attuned by an Evil Rogue)

This Shortsword carries with it a feeling of dread and despair.  By itself it appears to be a Shortsword +1, but once attuned its true power can be used.  When attuned it has a +3 to attack and damage rolls.  If the user is also wielding Gloom when attacking, they may make an attack with both weapons as 1 Action.

When the weapon is unsheathed those within a 15 foot radius of the wielder get the feeling of impending Doom and have Disadvantage on Saving throws, the wielder is not effected.  If the user rolls a natural 20 on an attack, a surge of negative energy enters the target inflicting an additional 18 (4d8) necrotic damage. This becomes 6d8 necrotic if the wielder is also using Gloom.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
